## Server.Configuration interface

Server configuration

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Configuration
```

## Properties

| Property                                                                      | Type                                                                       | Description                                            |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| [browser](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/browser)                    | { log: boolean; indicator: boolean; overlay: boolean; }                    | Client features                                        |
| [dev](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/dev)                            | { url: string; }                                                           | Development server URL                                 |
| [disableHostCheck?](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/disablehostcheck) | boolean                                                                    | <i>(Optional)</i> Disable host check security features |
| [filename?](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/filename)                 | string                                                                     | <i>(Optional)</i> Filename to serve as index.          |
| [middleware](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/middleware)              | Record&lt;string, boolean&gt;                                              | Enable middleware                                      |
| [proxy](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/proxy)                        | { url: string; replace: { href: true; window: true; publicPath: true; }; } | Development server URL                                 |
| [publicPath?](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/publicpath)             | string                                                                     | <i>(Optional)</i> The publicPath to serve from.        |
| [watch](/api/bud-framework/server/configuration/watch)                        | { files: Array&lt;string&gt;; }                                            | Files which should reload the browser when changed.    |
